title: Pure lignin induces overexpression of cytochrome P450 (CYP) encoding genes and brings insights into the lignocellulose depolymerization by Trametes villosa
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Luiz Marcelo Ribeiro Tomé, Mariana Teixeira Dornelles Parise, Doglas Parise, Vasco Ariston de Carvalho Azevedo, Bertram Brenig, Fernanda Badotti, Aristóteles Góes-Neto
